short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that provides AI-powered semantic search over web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sloth Search will attempt to answer your queries based on the content of the page you are on. It extracts the text from the page, identifies the relevant snippets, and formats an answer using an OpenAI's GPT. It is particularly useful for text-heavy websites such as Wikipedia.

You will need to provide your own OpenAI API key to use this extension.

Sloth Search is open-source: https://github.com/Michael-JB/sloth-search.
